# Continuous probability distributions

```{r cont-p, echo=FALSE, fig.width=7, fig.height=4, out.width="800px", fig.retina=2, fig.align="center"}
x <- seq(0, 400)
ggplot() +
  aes(x = x, y = dnorm(x, 200, 50)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    x = "f0 (Hz)", y = "Density"
  )
```
